name: galvanize
effect: When this Pokémon uses a Normal moves, that move is Electric its power is 1.2×.
short_effect: This Pokémon's Normal moves are Electric and have their power increased to 1.2×.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
